name: Hit The Rock
description:
Hit The Rock  and try to save the fairies! 

To do this you will have to press only one key (BACKSPACE), but your timing needs to be perfect!

Just 6 hits, 2 per stage.
 Can you do it?  If yes show us your score!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Story:

The old witch in her unbridled wickedness imprisoned all the fairies 
of the woods inside a rock of the 4th dimension.
  You're the only one who can save them! For this you have to hit the 
rock with the magic cube for six times.
  But the nefarious witch will not make things easy for you: 
every 2 hits the rock will change place.
  Will you be able to save the little fairies ?! 
Hit the cube on the rock only 6 times and they 
will be free!
  Good luck!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Backspace  (move the ball)

Esc  (pause or quit)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Advice:

Works better in fullscreen mode.
